meta.description: Compare the top national universities in the U.S. Learn more about the best national universities to find the right school for you.
meta.og:title: The Best National Universities in America
meta.og:description: See how the top national universities rank at US News. Find rankings for the best national universities in the US.

toggle.heading: Here are the best colleges in the U.S.

hero.title: Best National University Rankings
hero.description: Schools in the National Universities category, such as the University of Chicago and Carnegie Mellon University, offer a full range of undergraduate majors, plus master's and doctoral programs. These colleges also are committed to producing groundbreaking research.
hero.subtitle: Here are the best colleges in the U.S.

institution.footnote: This school declined to fill out the U.S. News & World Report main statistical survey. Data that appears is from either what the school reported in previous years or from another source, such as the National Center for Education Statistics.

acceptanceRate.noteText: Data reported to U.S. News in previous years

satAvg.noteText: Previous year's data was used in the ranking calculation.

actAvg.noteText: Previous year's data was used in the ranking calculation.

items.blurb: Founded in 1909, Lesley University is a private institution. Lesley University follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered selective.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT may not be required by school for some or all applicants, and in reporting SAT/ACT scores, the school did not include all students for whom it had scores, or refused to tell U.S. News whether all students with scores had been included.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT may not be required by school for some or all applicants, and in reporting SAT/ACT scores, the school did not include all students for whom it had scores, or refused to tell U.S. News whether all students with scores had been included.

items.blurb: Founded in 1897, Lincoln Memorial University is a private institution. The school has 68.9% of its classes with fewer than 20 students, and the student-faculty ratio at Lincoln Memorial University is 13:1.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1879, Sam Houston State University is a public institution. Sam Houston State University offers a Greek system, where 6 percent of the student body is involved in a sorority and 5% is involved in a fraternity.

The University of Memphis, also called U of M, offers packages of themed classes for freshmen to take in learning communities during their first semester. Past themes for the program, called Fresh Connections, have ranged from Africans in History to War, Peace and Zombies.

institution.aliasNames: UMKC University of Missouri Kansas City

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: At the University of Missouri—Kansas City, students can explore more than 175 clubs and about 15 Greek-letter organizations. Former President Harry Truman attended the law school at UMKC for two years and later received the school's first honorary degree.

institution.aliasNames: UNLV University of Nevada Las Vegas

items.blurb: At the University of Nevada—Las Vegas, students can get involved in research projects at the Center for Gaming Research, the Arnold Shaw Popular Music Research Center and more. The UNLV Rebels are Division I competitors.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: The University of New England is a private school in Maine with one campus in Biddeford and another in Portland. Students at both UNE campuses can get involved in many clubs and annual events, such as a semiformal dance and an overnight trip to Canada.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Located on the eastern edge of the state in the city of Grand Forks, the University of North Dakota offers nearly 300 academic fields, including a highly ranked rural medicine program. Notable UND alumni include Sally Smith, CEO of the Buffalo Wild Wings restaurant franchise.

institution.aliasNames: University of St Francis University of Saint Francis

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1920, University of St. Francis is a private institution. University of St. Francis offers a Greek system, where 1 percent of the student body is involved in a sorority and 3% is involved in a fraternity.
Founded in 1888, Utah State University is a public institution. Utah State University follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered more selective.

utag_data.stitial_fact: The most popular fields of study for international students in the U.S. are business and management and engineering.
